# LifeGame-TUI

**Table of Contents**

- [LifeGame-TUI](#lifegame-tui)

  - [Usage](#usage)

## Installation

```console
pip install lifegame-tui
```

## Usage

Run

```console
lifegame --help  # not `LifeGame-TUI`
```

for more infomation.
